Description: Vegas' Most WantedSpend the evening with country music artists at an intimate, no-frills venue for live performances serving classic spirits & a variety of beers on tap. You never know who you might run into...This Life Ain't For Everybody!
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Connoisseur CentralThe elegant Petrossian gently sets the mood for sophisticated tastes and discerning palates.Indulge in a splendid evening with live music from the one-of-a-kind Steinway grand or relax on one of the velvet couches that overlook the casino.Savor house-made infused cocktails, the vodka sampler, smoked salmon and caviar or afternoon tea. An epicurean's delight, Petrossian Bar is the ultimate respite for enjoying the finer things in life.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: A Taste of the ActionWhether Home or Away, TAP is the place to be before, during, and after all Golden Knight_s games. With a whopping 60 HD flat screen TV's there's no better place to keep the live sports action in full view surrounded with sports memorabilia from some of the greatest athletes in history. Join us and other sports fan for great food, ice cold beer and an Unparalleled sports dining experience
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109

Description: Drink Up. Double Down.True to its name, Whiskey Down features an impressive selection of more than 50 different types of rare and fine American, Canadian, Irish and Scotch whiskies along with hand-crafted cocktails and other dark spirits.While this gaming lounge has plenty of action with three blackjack tables and seven video poker machines, the plush leather sofas and oversized chairs give it the vibe of a relaxing speakeasy with a vintage, industrial flair.
Location: 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
